entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
